name: HEASLEY&PARTNERS
description:
HEASLEY&PARTNERS is a branding company that since 1994 has been creating The Heart Effect™ in companies and taking them from business to brand to breakthrough and beyond. 
In the process, we first find the heart, then craft the message, image it and put it into high gear through actions and systems. HEASLEY&PARTNERS works with companies globally because of our high-demand method of building brands, inspiring corporate culture and helping companies and people break through.
